question: Aakarshi Kashyap is associated with which sports?
explanation: Indiaâ€™s top-ranked junior shuttler Aakarshi Kashyap from Bhilai won U-17 and U-19 singles titles at Badminton junior Nationals in Guwahati, Assam on December 18, 2017.
